name: Entangled (itch) (Big Roy)
description:
Submission to Global Game Jam 2023, Dalhousie University Game Jam site:

https://globalgamejam.org/2023/games/entangled-0

Entangled is a puzzle game about growing and merging plants.

Space to advance time by one tick

R to restart the current level

Click the plants on the right panel and plant them in holes and advance time at strategic moments to get the plant head into the yellow goal square!

Strawberries go up!

Blueberries go right!

Garlic smells bad! Plants won't grow if they move adjacent to a garlic!

NOTE: Sometimes it doesn't work. Sometimes pressing space before planting helps, we don't know why. Good luck!

Credits: 

Mac Burton

Trent Baker

Rachel Woodside

Zach MacLean-Guy

Ethan Anderson

Jarod Primeau
